column2: An ancient scourge of the living has been unleashed and only the mindless can escape the creeping feeling of desperation and horror caused by the Hand of Nagash.
To be honest it is mostly executioner. Everyone who stands against Nagash is guilty by default.
Focussing the winds of death around him, the Hand of Nagash can unleash a devastating wave of destruction.

The Hand of Nagash has strapped the torso of a most hated foe to his halberd. Though the name of this unlucky person is lost to time, it is said that the terror and pain of his last moments still radiates from his tortured remains.
When the Hand of Nagash fades, the forbidden runes of this Blade activate, using the life of his enemies to preserve his unholy existence.
